Removing our garden

Link

Wherein our intrepid narrater attempts to remove a "garden" from a Baltimore rowhouse.

Wherein our intrepid narrater attempts to remove a "garden" from a Baltimore rowhouse.

Removing our garden

Link
08 Jun 2014

I brought out the heavy artillery - rat traps, chicken wire, smoke bombs - but I know when to admit defeat. The rats were going to make their way into the dirt in our backyard regardless of my efforts to prevent them.

  • Time for this rat incubator to go.
  • Just some dirt and some bricks. Looks easy enough
  • It was pretty easy to dismantle the bricks with a hammer and a chisel
  • The hard part was getting all the dirt, shovel full by shovel full, from the backyard, through the fence and into the back of the truck
  • Man, this dirt is heavy!
  • Man, this dirt is heavy!
  • All loaded up
  • Here I am at the city dump. More shoveling...
  • Vultures all around
  • Looking better
  • Another shot of the backyard
